term.title: adsorption chromatography

item.text: Chromatography in which separation is based mainly on differences between the adsorption affinities of the sample components for the surface of an active solid.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 826 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
